casebody.data:
UNITED STATES of America, Appellee, v. Nathan COSMAN, Appellant. No. 175. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. Jan. 10, 1938. Myron G. Ehrlich, of Washington, D. C., for appellant. Curtis C. Shears, of New York City, for the United States.

Before L. HAND, SWAN, and AUGUSTUS N. HAND, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Order affirmed on authority of United States v. Greenhaus, 85 F.2d 116, 107 A.L.R. 630, certiorari denied 299 U.S. 596, 57 S.Ct. 192, 81 L.Ed. 439.
